full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
W0138-23A038 - Liquid Nitrogen and Oxygen
### Reference Number
WS4213414609- Doc4213446306

### Amendment Information
* Amendment number: 1
* Amendment date: 2023-12-14

### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation number: WS4213414609
* Publication date: 2023-10-18
* Closing date: 2023-12-15T14:00:00

### Procurement Details
* Procurement category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade agreements applicable: Various trade agreements, including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contract Details
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-user entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Regions of delivery: Saguenay

### Contact Information
* Contact name: Melanie Caty, PSPC
* Email: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide liquid oxygen (LOX) and liquid nitrogen (LIN), including delivery, installation, and monthly rental of large capacity reservoirs, and their maintenance. The requirement is for a location in Bagotville, QC.

### Access to Tender Details
For more information, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17757859?extsite=Mjc5MjI4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*Download addenda and other documents related to this procurement*

Please note that this tender has been expired and the closing date has already been passed. The available documents are for informational purposes only. If you have any further questions, please contact PSPC using the contact information above. 300
2023

This is a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of liquid oxygen, liquid nitrogen, and maintenance of large capacity reservoirs. The Defense Ministry is seeking offers from SAQN based on a specific set of conditions. 

 Here are the relevant documents for this proposal: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17757859?extsite=Mjc5Mj
